name: Saed Yousef
title: Software Engineer | Backend Specialist | Development Team Lead
subtitle: I build robust backend systems.
about: As a Development Team Lead with over 7 years of experience, I specialize in backend technologies, primarily PHP. My expertise lies in building robust web applications, integrating third-party systems, and architecting RESTful APIs.

I emphasize clean, maintainable code and best practices while guiding my team to deliver high-quality solutions. With a strong foundation in DevOps, I automate workflows, manage infrastructure, and ensure efficient deployments.
I'm passionate about leveraging technology to create scalable solutions and always open to new challenges.
